description: A custom made (in NY, USA) book embosser, ex libris or book seal will emboss an owner’s name with their unique design onto the book page or foil. If you’re a bibliophile or book worm, they’re a useful tool to stylishly identify the book as yours, personalized with your name or logo and without damaging the book - turning any book shelf into a collection. If you often lend your books to friends and family, an embossed design can serve as a gentle reminder to return it once finished, and they make wonderful gifts for book lovers of all ages. We sell several book embossers in a variety of designs, that you can customize with your own name/choice of text or graphic design. Upgrade to a larger size, add gold or silver foils or switch to a self inking stamp, which leaves an inked impression behind.
